name: Anime Thighs
description:
Who doesn't like some Anime Thighs?

The game

Anime Thighs is a puzzle game with 3 unique puzzle formulas that switch up every 4 levels, so be ready for a challenge, as with every level the game gets a bit harder!

Features


- Enjoy 12 unique levels with 3 different puzzle modes for you to complete.

- Visit the Gallery, revealing our girls artwork for each level you completed.
